mapper.update: UPDATE rank SET enabled=0 WHERE member_num=#{member_num}
UPDATE rank SET investment_amount=#{investment_amount}, net_profit=#{net_profit}, net_profit_ratio=#{net_profit_ratio}, enabled=1 WHERE member_num=#{member_num}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM as place, x.* FROM ( SELECT m.member_num, nickname, investment_amount, net_profit, net_profit_ratio FROM member m INNER JOIN rank r ON m.member_num=r.member_num WHERE r.enabled=1 AND r.investment_amount>=50000000 ORDER BY r.net_profit_ratio DESC, r.investment_amount DESC ) x

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rank WHERE enabled=1 AND (investment_amount BETWEEN 1000000 AND 9999999)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as place, x.* FROM ( SELECT m.member_num, nickname, investment_amount, net_profit, net_profit_ratio FROM member m INNER JOIN rank r ON m.member_num=r.member_num WHERE r.enabled=1 AND (r.investment_amount BETWEEN 1000000 AND 9999999) ORDER BY r.net_profit_ratio DESC, r.investment_amount DESC ) x WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE place > (#{page}-1) * #{amount}
